title: PLACMENT GAMES???
body:
okay can someone please explain this. in season 4 I was silver V, I played all my placement games and won 9 out of the 10 at the end of the last game it tells me that I am still silver V ?!?!?. I mean I started there how could of not gone anywhere wen I won 9 games. can someone plz explain
 this for me

replies.body: Placements put you back in slightly lower than what you earned. Hence, you performed slightly better than last season, meaning you just negated that lowering.

Would you rather be placed in bronze 4 like a lot of other people

I won 5/10 and I got put into bronze 4 from silver 4.
